name: enigma-stone
effect: When taken to the pewter city museum, causes latias or latios to attack the trainer. The Pokémon to appear will be whicher can’t be encountered roaming in the wild.
short_effect: S: Summons Latias H: Summons Latios.

flavor_text.x_y: A crystal ball that was excavated from the ground. It’s a very beautiful stone that is covered with bits of rock and earth.
